name: Social Contagion Disruption
description: Breaking the psychological and social infection spread by PSN-controlled narratives.

cards.title: Inoculating the Masses
cards.description: Creating psychological immunity against PSN influence.
bulletpoints: Teaching pattern recognition to help people detect manipulative messaging.
Using humor and satire to make PSN narratives look absurd.
Building resilience training to prevent emotional exploitation.
cards.summaryText: Train people to spot the tells, laugh at the lies, and stay emotionally untouchable.

cards.title: Reversing the Herd Effect
cards.description: Turning the power of social contagion against PSN influence.
bulletpoints: Creating viral truth-based counter-narratives that spread organically.
Using ethical social engineering to redirect mass psychology toward reality.
Exploiting PSN overconfidence to trigger their own self-destruction.
cards.summaryText: Let truth go viral, steer the crowd back to reality, and bait PSNs into overplaying their hand.

cards.title: Hijacking Their Propaganda Systems
cards.description: Redirecting their psychological warfare tactics against themselves.
bulletpoints: Using their own persuasion techniques to lead people out of their influence.
Strategically placing disruptive truths where their followers will find them.
Forcing narrative conflicts within their ranks through well-placed interventions.
cards.summaryText: Co-opt their tools, drop inconvenient truths in their path, and spark infighting from within.
